price: (62) [Moses] said, "No! Indeed, with me is my Lord; He will guide me."
arabic: قَالَ كَلَّآۖ إِنَّ مَعِيَ رَبِّي سَيَهۡدِينِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qāla kallā inna maʿiya rabbī sayahdīni
